2025 Detroit Tigers Statistics

2024 Season

Record: 49-30, 1st place in AL_Central (Schedule and Results)

Playoff Odds: 99.7% to make postseason, 11.8% to win World Series

Manager: A.J. Hinch (49-30)

President: Scott Harris (President, Baseball Operations)

General Manager: Jeff Greenberg

Farm Director: Shane Farrell

Scouting Director: Mark Conner

Ballpark: Comerica Park

Attendance: 1,066,266 (8th of 15)

Park Factors: (Over 100 favors batters, under 100 favors pitchers.)
    Multi-year: Batting - 99, Pitching - 98
    One-year: Batting - 98, Pitching - 95

Pythagorean W-L: 48-31, 391 Runs, 309 Runs Allowed
